Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $18000. I am confident that you will find its benefits to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
